inclusion.criterion: stable clinical response to L-DOPA and DAergic agents
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: early or mild-to-moderate PD (Hoehn & Yahr scale < 3)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: non-demented, non-depressed, with parkinsonian symptoms and signs primarily akineto-rigid
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: mild or moderate tremor (UPDRS tremor ratings 1 or 2 in the right upper limb)

exclusion.criterion: marked resting tremor (UPDRS scale > 3 in the right upper limb)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: progressive neurological disorders other than PD
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a stable clinical response to L-DOPA and DAergic agents, is in an early or mild-to-moderate stage of PD, and does not have dementia or depression. However, the patient's resting tremor status is unknown.
